## Aufgabe: T-TEST

### Analysemodell

```{r fig_1, echo=FALSE}
DiagrammeR::grViz("
digraph {
  graph [layout = circo]
  node [shape = circle]
    A [label = 'supp']
    B [label = 'length']
  edge []
    A -> B
}
")
```

### Univariate Analyse

```{r table_1, echo=TRUE}
summary(ToothGrowth)
```

```{r table_2, echo=TRUE}
vc  <-  subset(ToothGrowth,  supp=="VC")
summary(vc[c(1,3)])
```

```{r table_3, echo=TRUE}
oj  <-  subset(ToothGrowth,  supp=="OJ")
summary(oj[c(1,3)])
```

### Bivariate Analyse

```{r fig_2, echo=TRUE}
boxplot(ToothGrowth$len ~ ToothGrowth$supp,  xlab  =  "supp",  ylab  = 
"length")
```

```{r table_4, echo=TRUE}
t.test(ToothGrowth$len ~ ToothGrowth$supp)
```
